enchantment.chromaticenchantments.starsh: Fired arrows travel in a straight line at a constant speed until they hit a block or touch water.
enchantment.chromaticenchantments.conser: Fireworks used for Elytra boosting have a chance to not be consumed.
enchantment.chromaticenchantments.voidin: Blocks mined and mobs slain by this tool will not drop items. Experience drops are unaffected.
